post.text: THANK YOU Phoenix, Arizona! Time for new POWERFUL leadership. Just imagine what WE can accomplish in our first 100 days! #DrainTheSwamp

comment.author: Karlee
comment.text: Romans 13:1-7 ESV / 315 helpful votes Let every person be subject to the governing authorities. For there is no authority except from God, and those that exist have been instituted by God. Therefore whoever resists the authorities resists what God has appointed, and those who resist will incur judgment. For rulers are not a terror to good conduct, but to bad. Would you have no fear of the one who is in authority? Then do what is good, and you will receive his approval, for he is God's servant for your good. But if you do wrong, be afraid, for he does not bear the sword in vain. For he is the servant of God, an avenger who carries out God's wrath on the wrongdoer. Therefore one must be in subjection, not only to avoid God's wrath but also for the sake of conscience. ... GO TRUMP/PENCE!!! 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸

replies.author: Meghan
replies.text: 📣Donald Trumps is the Worst Candidate that ever ran in the History of America👎 He NOT EVEN A TRUE REPUBLICAN. plus he has upcoming court cases in November for defrauding American's out their hard earned money with his Scam University. And a Rape Case he's charged with and has to go on trial for in Dec also. Let's don't forget even the Alleged upcoming so far 12 Women he is accused of molesting that he's going to have to face and go on trial for next year. Face it America Trump is a Deplorable and Despicable Person plagued with Persistent Ignorance👎I hope the judge throws the book at him literally and Locks him up period. #NeverTrump👎

replies.author: Karlee
replies.text: Michael Napolitano Faith. Faith and prayer will lead us back to Him. Get on your face and be real with the only one true redeemer. He's listening. 🙏 He wants to redeem His people but we first have to submit and ask for His forgiveness and guidance. Repent. Call the Spirit. He will surround us 🙌
